The lawsuits also target other companies, including Procter & Gamble, Chattem Inc, and Hello Products LLC, which make similar products.

statement: Hawaiian Electric plans to reduce the risk of wildfires started by its equipment through a 3-year safety strategy, which includes deploying new technology, fortifying infrastructure, minimizing fire hazards, and expanding community partnerships.
